Posts.Content: Hi Julia Today I get my PortaCath inserted and Wednesday start treatment. It is scary and I am leaning on God to carry me through. I had beast cancer 9 years ago and was just diagnosed with metastasis to the liver. My blessings to you. Arline
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Metastasi to The Liver

Posts.Content: Hi Julia I am just beginning treatment for my cancer that is breast metastasis to the liver. I had a mastectomy 9 years ago and in the last two months have been diagnosed. Will take injection chemo for the 1st day, then 10 days of pill form, nothing the next 10 days and then repeat the sessions until liver has shrunk enough (hopefully) to do cryoablation. I would love for any of you to email me so we can chat about the cancer and treatment I am beginning. Thank you - Arline
